sources.note: Main vendor website. Wix-based, client-side rendered — could not scrape content directly. Search engine snippets reveal positioning as EMR, medical billing services, and practice management company. Title references 'Top Electronic Medical Record & Medical Billing services.'
Alternate homepage (2026 version). Same rendering issues. Search snippets mention ariaone AI platform, Lumina, revQ, and integrated EHR/PM/RCM solutions.
Medical billing system page. Could not render content. URL confirms dedicated billing product/service offering.
NJ-specific medical billing services page. Confirms Enable Healthcare markets billing services regionally.

Comprehensive MDnet overview: cloud-based EHR, pricing tiers ($250-$550/month plus bundles), features including e-prescribing, patient portal, CCM, billing, scheduling, document management. Supported specialties: cardiology, OBGYN, pediatrics, behavioral health, internal medicine. User sentiment mixed — good on support and ease of use, negative on billing issues and customization.

Software Advice profile. MDnet described as comprehensive integrated EHR platform for 15+ years. Mentions AI-powered charting (EnableAssist), web-based, ONC-certified. Pricing from $250/provider/month.
Capterra listing for MDnet EHR. Pricing and feature overview consistent with other sources.
GetApp listing. Confirms features and pricing. Notes API availability.

iOS App Store listing for MDNet app by Enable Healthcare Inc. Key details: touch-based EHR, voice recognition, telehealth, e-prescribing, electronic lab results, real-time analytics, multi-site/multi-specialty support, integrated chat. Version 1.2.4. Developer links to ehiconnect.com.
MedicalRecords.com listing. Minimal content extractable due to rendering.
LOINC adopter listing — confirms Enable Healthcare uses LOINC coding standards.
LinkedIn profile. Reports 501-1000 employees, founded 2008, East Hanover NJ.
PitchBook profile. Reports 194 employees, founded 2006. Private company.
BBB listing. Confirms East Hanover, NJ location. Healthcare management category.
